title: Definitions
context: ยง482D-1 Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Article&rdquo; or &ldquo;article of merchandise&rdquo; means any goods, wares, works of art, commodities, or other things which may be lawfully kept or offered for sale, imported into, or exported from the State. &ldquo;Person&rdquo; means an individual, partnership, corporation, or any other form of business enterprise, capable of being in violation of this chapter. &ldquo;Stamped&rdquo; means branded, engraved, or printed on the article or upon any sign, tag, card, label, box, package, cover, or wrapper used to encase, enclose, display or promote the article. &ldquo;Test&rdquo; means analysis or assay to determine the fineness of the gold, silver, or alloy. &ldquo;Trademark&rdquo; shall include any trademark or trade name duly registered under the laws of the United States. [L 1990, c 343, pt of ยง2; am L 2008, c 19, ยง45]
